com.exacttarget.etpushsdk
Class ETLocationManager

java.lang.Object
  com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETLocationManager

public class ETLocationManager
extends Object

ETLocationManager is responsible for finding an accurate location and retrieving a list of geofences from ExactTarget. These regions are monitored for entry and exit and will trigger various notifications when boundaries are crossed.

public void startWatchingLocation()
Start monitoring location. Retrieve a set of nearby geofence messages after we know where the user is located.
